ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Green Clean Challenge
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Clean up your local park or beach and win exciting prizes.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Solar Innovation Contest
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Create innovative solar-powered devices to solve environmental problems.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Recycled Art Exhibition
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Showcase your artistic talent using recycled materials.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Tree Planting Marathon
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Join a mass tree planting event to combat deforestation.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Energy-Saving Home Challenge
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Reduce your home's energy consumption and win energy-efficient appliances.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Bike to Work Week
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Participate in a week-long challenge to commute to work using bicycles.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Ocean Conservation Dive
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Contribute to coral reef restoration and marine life conservation while scuba diving.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Eco-Friendly Fashion Show
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Showcase sustainable and eco-friendly fashion designs on the runway.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Clean Energy Hackathon
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Develop innovative tech solutions for clean and renewable energy sources.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Upcycled Garden Contest
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Transform waste materials into beautiful and functional garden features.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Green Tech Showcase
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Demonstrate and present eco-friendly technology and innovations.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Zero-Waste Cooking Competition
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Prepare delicious dishes using zero-waste principles and sustainable ingredients.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Community Clean Energy Drive
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Mobilize your community to adopt clean energy practices and win community rewards.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Eco-Quiz Challenge
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Test your knowledge on environmental issues and compete in a quiz competition.

ecoFriendlyCompetitions.name: Sustainable Farming Fair
ecoFriendlyCompetitions.details: Showcase sustainable farming practices and products at a local fair.
